Package com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.properties

Interface Summary
PropertyChangeListener Listener interface for receiving property value change events.
 

Class Summary
AdditionalChoicePropertyEditor Property editor for situations where a property involves additional choices, e.g.
BooleanPropertyEditor Property editor for boolean values.
ChoicePropertyEditor Property editor for a list of values.
ChoicePropertyEditor.Choice Caption/value pair for display in ChoicePropertyEditor.
ColorChoicePropertyEditor Property editor for color properties.
ColorChoicePropertyEditor.Color Color definitions for property editor.
EditableProperties A collection of properties with associated PropertyEditors.
EditableProperty Property for display in a PropertiesPanel.
FloatPropertyEditor Property editor for float values.
IntegerPropertyEditor Property editor for integer values.
NonNegativeFloatPropertyEditor Property editor for non-negative float values.
NonNegativeIntegerPropertyEditor Property editor for non-negative integer values.
PropertiesPanel Panel to display properties.
PropertyEditor Superclass for all property editors.
StringPropertyEditor Property editor for string values.
TextPropertyEditor Property editor for arbitrary text.
 

Exception Summary
TextPropertyEditor.InvalidTextException Thrown to indicate that text input is invalid.
